value.title: DAX Fridays! #121: Why you should avoid bi-directional relationships

value.title: DAX Fridays! #124: Weekly time intelligence in Power BI
value.excerpt: Are you also bummed out that there is no weekly time intelligence in DAX? Skip the talk and go right to it:  01:06 Calculate Weekly
